title: The Sunlight Has Gotten Stronger
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Phew, the sunlight has gotten stronger, huh.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Why don’t you use a parasol, Eli?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>A parasol? Well.... I’ve thought about using one, but I tend to keep forgetting about it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>That’s just because it’s not a habit yet! Listen! Beauty is a habit, okay? Keep doing it until it becomes part of your everyday life!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>O-, okay, I got it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Also, buy a parasol with a design you like. If you like it, then you won’t forget it, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>That’s true. I’ve only been using the one we have back home until now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Then let’s go buy one right now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eeeh!? A little stronger sunlight won’t hurt, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You have beautiful skin, okay? Being a little more careful makes sure you won’t get any weird sunburns, plus it’ll be easier for you later. Come on, we’re going!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
